column5: Wasn't sure if we were going to be able to do an outpost trip in 04 or not and now we've waited too long to get the lakes on the date we wanted. Anyone willing to suggest a fly in for excellent smallmouth bass fishing we might try. Basser

Take a look at www.canadaoutfitters.com. Cindy and Rand are superb hosts and have top-notch lakes and equipment. ' You may also want to check out www.exc-adventures.com, they were on our short list last year.

Try:http://www.kashabowieoutposts.com/fly_in_fishing.asp Good people, cabins, service, and fishing. They're located about 2.5 hours east of Ft. Francis/Int'l Falls or about 1.5 - 2 hours west of Thunder Bay. I've flown in with them several times and will again when finances permit.
